description:
Pfaudler, Inc., a cornerstone in the global markets for energy, chemicals, and industrial solutions with over 135 years of excellence, is on the lookout for a Technical Regional Sales Manager to drive sales momentum in the Lower Midwest region. This role is exclusively available to candidates residing in Arkansas, Oklahoma, Kansas, Kentucky, Missouri and Colorado, with a strong preference for Arkansas and Missouri.

About the Role:

As our Technical Regional Sales Manager, you'll be at the forefront of understanding the intricate needs and challenges our customers face in their chemical processing operations. Your mission will be to articulate the value of Pfaudler's diverse product suite as pivotal solutions. Our portfolio includes but is not limited to, glass-lined equipment, fluoropolymer equipment, alloy equipment, filter dryer equipment, borosilicate glass equipment, and precise instrumentation, along with engineered systems that leverage these technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
• Market Leadership: Elevate Pfaudler's market presence by increasing the order volume across our product range through tailored presentations and strategic follow-ups.
• Client Engagement: Utilize Salesforce for client base expansion and engagement, ensuring a streamlined process from opportunity qualification to deal closure.
• Product Expertise: Serve as the product expert, facilitating cross-selling opportunities to broaden our footprint in each account.
• Relationship Management: Build and nurture long-term relationships with clients while securing new accounts through strategic outreach and impeccable service delivery.
• Performance Reporting: Keep the leadership informed of your activities and achievements, setting benchmarks for success and areas for growth.

Travel and Client Interaction:

This role requires regular travel to customer sites for direct engagement, relationship building, equipment assessments, and presenting tailored solutions that meet their unique needs.

Ideal Candidate Profile:
• Educational Background: A Bachelor’s degree in Chemical Engineering or a closely related field.
• Experience: 8-10 years of relevant experience, with a strong foundation in chemical and pharmaceutical process understanding.
• Technical Proficiency: In-depth knowledge of the chemical processing industry and familiarity with Pfaudler’s product lineup.
• Soft Skills: Exceptional communication abilities, persuasive selling techniques, and resilience in handling objections and challenging scenarios.

Why Pfaudler?
• Joining Pfaudler means being part of a legacy of innovation and leadership in a critical industry. Pfaudler offers the chance to make a significant impact, fostering professional growth through ongoing training and development in a supportive, forward-thinking environment.
• Estimated OTE salary: 120k-150k, based on both sales and technical experience.
• Candidates with no relevant industry experience but with technical sales experience are still encouraged to apply.
• Above standard benefits package, including 401k matching.
